Articles.Content:
My current testing craft for my mods.

Notice that video is played at 2x speed at some points. Its not that fast, but behaves a bit similarly as Su-27 in flanker game series in my opinion. Oh, it has an ejections seat too. It was built a bit fragile on purpose to make it a little more challenging to land the thing. The cockpit is reinforced and it should stay intact and protect pilot in small to medium crash landings if you are too low to eject.

You can download it and the RedStar modpack needed from here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17081-Redstar-co-op-Airplane-parts
